content.question: The image was created most directly in response to the

choices.label: provision of government subsidies for transportation
rampant consumerism of the middle class
increased migration of people from southern and eastern Europe
consolidation of corporations into trusts and holding companies

content.answer: consolidation of corporations into trusts and holding companies

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify  a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience.
